### rgb.asy

<table class='asycat-table' style='display:table;break-inside:avoid-page;'><tr>
<td style='border:none;vertical-align:top;' class='asycat-td-code'>

```cpp {cmd=env args=["asyco", "-n"] .line-numbers output=none }
unitsize(2cm);

path[] p = new path[3];
p[0] = shift(0.75, 0) * unitcircle;
p[1] = rotate(120) * p[0];
p[2] = rotate(120) * p[1];
pen[] c = {rgb(1, 0, 0), rgb(0, 1, 0), rgb(0, 0, 1)};

for (int i: sequence(3))
  fill(p[i], c[i]);
for (int i: sequence(3))
  fill(buildcycle(p[i], p[(i + 1) % 3]), c[i] + c[(i + 1) % 3]);
fill(buildcycle(... p), c[0] + c[1] + c[2]);
draw(p);
label((0, -2), "{\sffamily 加法}混色$^1$", fontsize(16pt));
```

</td><td style='border:none;vertical-align:top;width:30%;' class='asycat-td-fig'>

```cpp {cmd=env args=["asyco", "-A", "N", "--alt=rgb"] output=html .hide continue}
// "Run Code Chunk" (Shift + Enter) here.
```

### cmyk.asy

<table class='asycat-table' style='display:table;break-inside:avoid-page;'><tr>
<td style='border:none;vertical-align:top;' class='asycat-td-code'>

```cpp {cmd=env args=["asyco", "-n"] .line-numbers output=none }
unitsize(2cm);

path[] p = new path[3];
p[0] = rotate(180) * shift(0.75, 0) * unitcircle;
p[1] = rotate(120) * p[0];
p[2] = rotate(120) * p[1];
pen[] c = {cmyk(1,0,0,0), cmyk(0,1,0,0), cmyk(0,0,1,0)};

for (int i: sequence(3))
  fill(p[i], c[i]);
for (int i: sequence(3))
  fill(buildcycle(p[i], p[(i + 1) % 3]), c[i] + c[(i + 1) % 3]);
fill(buildcycle(... p), c[0] + c[1] + c[2]);
draw(p);
label((0, -2), "{\sffamily 減法}混色$^2$", fontsize(16pt));
```

</td><td style='border:none;vertical-align:top;width:30%;' class='asycat-td-fig'>

```cpp {cmd=env args=["asyco", "-A", "N", "--alt=cmyk"] output=html .hide continue}
// "Run Code Chunk" (Shift + Enter) here.
```

### rgb.mp

<table class='asycat-table' style='display:table;break-inside:avoid-page;'><tr>
<td style='border:none;vertical-align:top;' class='asycat-td-code'>

```metafont {cmd=env args=["mepoco", "-n"] .line-numbers output=none }
beginfig(1);
u := 3cm;

path p[];
p[0] := fullcircle scaled 2u shifted (0.75u, 0);
p[1] := p[0] rotated 120;
p[2] := p[1] rotated 120;
color c[]; c[0] := (1, 0, 0); c[1] := (0, 1, 0); c[2] := (0, 0, 1);

for i = 0 upto 2:
  fill p[i] withcolor c[i];
endfor;
for i = 0 upto 2:
  fill buildcycle(p[i], p[(i + 1) mod 3]) withcolor c[i] + c[(i + 1) mod 3];
endfor;
fill buildcycle(p[0], p[1], p[2]) withcolor c[0] + c[1] + c[2];
draw(p[0]); draw(p[1]); draw(p[2]);
label(btex 加法混色$^1$ etex scaled 2, (0, -2u));
endfig;
end;
```

</td><td style='border:none;vertical-align:top;width:30%;' class='asycat-td-fig'>

```metafont {cmd=env args=["mepoco", "-A", "N", "-U", "--alt=rgb"] output=html .hide continue}
% "Run Code Chunk" (Shift + Enter) here.
```

### cmyk.mp

<table class='asycat-table' style='display:table;break-inside:avoid-page;'><tr>
<td style='border:none;vertical-align:top;' class='asycat-td-code'>

```metafont {cmd=env args=["mepoco", "-n"] .line-numbers output=none }
beginfig(2);
u := 3cm;

path p[];
p[0] := fullcircle scaled 2u shifted (0.75u, 0) rotated 180;
p[1] := p[0] rotated 120;
p[2] := p[1] rotated 120;
cmykcolor c[]; c[0] := (1, 0, 0, 0); c[1] := (0, 1, 0, 0); c[2] := (0, 0, 1, 0);

for i = 0 upto 2:
  fill p[i] withcmykcolor c[i];
endfor;
for i = 0 upto 2:
  fill buildcycle(p[i], p[(i + 1) mod 3]) withcmykcolor c[i] + c[(i + 1) mod 3];
endfor;
fill buildcycle(p[0], p[1], p[2]) withcmykcolor c[0] + c[1] + c[2];
draw(p[0]); draw(p[1]); draw(p[2]);
label(btex 減法混色$^2$ etex scaled 2, (0, -2u));
endfig;
end;
```

</td><td style='border:none;vertical-align:top;width:30%;' class='asycat-td-fig'>


### rgb+cmyk.mp

<table class='asycat-table' style='display:table;break-inside:avoid-page;'><tr>
<td style='border:none;vertical-align:top;' class='asycat-td-code'>

```metafont {cmd=env args=["mepoco", "-n"] .line-numbers output=none }
u := 3cm;

beginfig(1);
path p[];
p[0] := fullcircle scaled 2u shifted (0.75u, 0);
p[1] := p[0] rotated 120;
p[2] := p[1] rotated 120;
color c[]; c[0] := (1, 0, 0); c[1] := (0, 1, 0); c[2] := (0, 0, 1);

for i = 0 upto 2:
  fill p[i] withcolor c[i];
endfor;
for i = 0 upto 2:
  fill buildcycle(p[i], p[(i + 1) mod 3]) withcolor c[i] + c[(i + 1) mod 3];
endfor;
fill buildcycle(p[0], p[1], p[2]) withcolor c[0] + c[1] + c[2];
draw(p[0]); draw(p[1]); draw(p[2]);
label(btex 加法混色$^1$ etex scaled 2, (0, -2u));
endfig;

beginfig(2);
path p[];
p[0] := fullcircle scaled 2u shifted (0.75u, 0) rotated 180;
p[1] := p[0] rotated 120;
p[2] := p[1] rotated 120;
cmykcolor c[]; c[0] := (1, 0, 0, 0); c[1] := (0, 1, 0, 0); c[2] := (0, 0, 1, 0);

for i = 0 upto 2:
  fill p[i] withcmykcolor c[i];
endfor;
for i = 0 upto 2:
  fill buildcycle(p[i], p[(i + 1) mod 3]) withcmykcolor c[i] + c[(i + 1) mod 3];
endfor;
fill buildcycle(p[0], p[1], p[2]) withcmykcolor c[0] + c[1] + c[2];
draw(p[0]); draw(p[1]); draw(p[2]);
label(btex 減法混色$^2$ etex scaled 2, (0, -2u));
endfig;

end;
```
